overview: Since Nick's arrival, Weston has been plagued by fear and murder. The unprepared police force has proven to be an asset to Nick, and the small town has become a safe haven for his dark deeds. Nick's life begins to unravel, however, as new relationships threaten to reveal his secret - a secret he has killed to protect. But he soon discovers that he is not the only one with secrets...
title: Death to the World
